title: LF Scrims - Diamond+ Roster
body:
Fusion Gaming is looking for teams to scrim, we currently have two teams.

**Fusion Ice** - Looking for scrims which are **either**: Diamond - Chall ranks, top tier OOL teams or OCS+ 

**Fusion Fire **- Looking for scrims which are **either**: high plat+ ranks, OOL teams

Add me on either Discord or League to talk more about scrims!
League IGN: Aurora
Discord: Blake #5405

In Fusion Ice we currently have 3 ex-OCS players.

replies.body:
Hey there! Our team is looking to improve and we'd be keen to scrim, teammates currently around Plat-Diamond rank. 

IGN: TerraVando, sent you a request  :)
